Game.Name: Cars Mater-National Championship
Game.Plot: Cars Mater-National Championship is a title for video game consoles and handhelds released on October 29, 2007 by THQ. It is the sequel to the 2006 video game Cars, which was based on the Cars film from Pixar. In 2009, a sequel called Cars Race-O-Rama was released. This is the last Pixar game to be released on Game Boy Advance.
